description: Navigation strategy analysis involves evaluating how users interact with a system to find information or complete tasks. This can include understanding user behavior patterns and optimizing the navigation structure to enhance user experience.
you_have_this_if: Users frequently struggle to find information within your application.
There are high drop-off rates at certain navigation points.
User feedback indicates confusion about how to navigate the system.
Analytics show low engagement with certain features due to navigation issues.

approaches.best_for: When analyzing user behavior in navigation-heavy applications to optimize information retrieval.
approaches.key_tradeoff: DeepWalk provides insights into user navigation patterns but may require significant computational resources.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to analyze complex user navigation patterns in a large dataset.

start_here: Start with DeepWalk if you are focused on understanding user navigation behavior in detail, as it can reveal hidden patterns in user interactions.
